
---
title: "Site Initiation Visit (SIV)"
---

## Purpose
Ensure site staff are fully trained and operationally ready
to conduct the trial.

## SIV Preparation (CRA)
- Review protocol and amendments
- Confirm required regulatory documents collected
- Prepare SIV agenda and training materials
- Coordinate site staff attendance

## SIV Execution Topics
- Protocol overview
- Informed consent process
- Safety reporting procedures
- Data entry and EDC training
- IP handling and accountability
- Lab and imaging workflows

## CRA Deliverables
- Attendance/training log
- SIV report or documentation
- Follow-up action items
